items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.
items.title: yerTools/simple-frontend-stack: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.

items.content_html: GlinUI is an open-source, lightweight, and modular UI component library for React, built with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. It offers a collection of customizable and performance-optimized components to help developers build modern, responsive web applications with ease.
items.title: thegdsks/glinui: GlinUI is an open-source, lightweight, and modular UI component library for React, built with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. It offers a collection of customizable and performance-optimized components to help developers build modern, responsive web applications with ease.
